Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/vstartGap

Synopsis Vertical gap at start of composition.
Function FProperty vstartGap(bool gap)
Description Specifies if a vcat or grid will start with (half) a vertical gap. See also startGap and hstartGap.
